repo.description: The most widely used Python to C compiler
repo.name: cython

body:
We previously only did this for tuples of types.

See https://github.com/cython/cython/issues/6420
See https://github.com/cython/cython/issues/4631

commit.message:
Optimise type checks from PEP-604 union types (joined by bitwise or), not only from tuples.

See https://github.com/cython/cython/issues/6420
Remove unnecessary special case and test that it is not needed.
Refactor union unpacking, use more obvious Stack data structure.
Add test for non-trivial object arg allowing None.

milestone.description: First feature release after the cleanup releases 3.0 and 3.1.

title: Optimise type checks from PEP-604 union types (joined by bitwise or)
